summary: The Gold Spinners is a story about the birth, glory, and disappearance of a peculiar, invisible, and mighty business empire, the film studio Eesti Reklaamfilm, the only company producing commercials in the Soviet Union.
cast: Tõnu Aav|Peedu Ojamaa|Artemiy Troitskiy|Olav Osolin|Mart Pukk|Harry Egipt|Ivo Linna|Peeter Simm|Hardi Volmer|Anu Saagim|Peeter Volkonski|Priit Pärn|Kiur Aarma
title: El curioso caso de la agencia de publicidad soviética
